title: Product Photo Studio
description: Generate professional product photography prompts optimized for e-commerce and marketing

blocks.content: Product name, photo style, background, lighting, aspect ratio
Pure JSON output, specific prompts, include negatives, safe parameters
JSON prompt pack with providers object
Subject description, style keywords, no markdown, valid params

examples: {"intent":"product_photo","providers":{"midjourney_v6":{"positive":"Professional studio product photo of premium wireless headphones, clean white seamless background, soft diffused lighting, commercial photography, sharp focus, high-end product shot, 8k quality","negative":"blurry, low quality, distorted, amateur, shadows, noise","params":{"ar":"1:1","stylize":100,"quality":1},"instructions":"/imagine prompt: Professional studio product photo of premium wireless headphones, clean white seamless background, soft diffused lighting, commercial photography, sharp focus, high-end product shot, 8k quality --ar 1:1 --stylize 100 --q 1 --no blurry, low quality, distorted, amateur, shadows, noise"},"sdxl":{"positive":"Professional studio product photo of premium wireless headphones, clean white seamless background, soft diffused lighting, commercial photography, sharp focus, high-end product shot, 8k quality","negative":"blurry, low quality, distorted, amateur, harsh shadows, noise, artifacts","params":{"width":1024,"height":1024,"steps":30,"cfg":7}}},"notes":["Use a light tent or softbox for even lighting","Consider multiple angles for e-commerce listings"]}

agentReadiness.notes: Output can be directly used with Midjourney Discord bot or SDXL API

author: meema-team
